akas: Lena - Love of My Life World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Lena - Love of My Life World-wide (English title)

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Lena Sander got fired after she had a big mouth towards her chief. She meets Amelie von Arensberg and her grandson David von Arensberg who is a successful musician. Rafael von Arensberg tries to get his mother Amelie into a retirement home.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Lena became insecure during her romantic meeting with David. After a quarrel with Tony Lena says yes to the job the countess offers her. Vanessa has to seduce David. Michael sees his father with college Gaby. Is Luca shadowed by his mother?

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: When Rafael wants to present his son David the new woman on his side, Vanessa is surprised because she had an affair with David. Rafael sends Lena out of the house to get rid of her.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Tony tries to convince Lena to give up her job but he gives in when Lena catches him working on a stolen car. Michael hears that his girlfriend Jasmin is pregnant. Janka should make the countess incompetent with pills.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Lena is confused after she almost kissed David. Tony does her a proposal of marriage she can't refuse; David is jealous. Gaby is prepared to tell Frank she is pregnant but Pia tells Frank his son Michael becomes father.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: David is confused after seeing Lena naked. In vain he tries to keep his mind from her with an ex-girlfriend and with Vanessa. The Sanders have a quarrel about Jasmin's pregnancy. Frank makes Jasmin part of his family.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Lena is confused when drunken David does her a declaration of love. She is disappointed when she finds a lot of women names in his note-book. Frank wants to let disappear Lena's bracelet, a proof for the dead of David's mother.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: After the quarrel with David, Lena is sure she wants to marry Tony. David makes love with Vanessa in the elevator of Rafael's office. Vanessa is frightened when she notices the security camera. Where is Luca? Lena finds him with Janka.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: After she ran out of the church for Tony it becomes clear to Lena she needs time to ponder; she does not know what exactly she feels for David. During a quarrel with Frank, Michael says that he knows more about the affair of his father.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Lena and David visit a classic concert together; Lena feels herself in the wrong place. With David's help she is able to enjoy the concert - until Tony appears there. Frank got fright when Gaby tells him she expects a baby from him.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: During the concert it becomes clear David really loves Lena. Fear makes David go on distance from her. He puts energy in finding an explanation for Julia's dead. When he visits the parking policeman, the feeling something's wrong rises.

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: David's feelings for Lena are too strong to stay on distance from her. Lena accompanies David to parking policeman Zöller. David wants to question him about his mother's dead. Zöller flees in his car and drives frontal towards Lena.

13.title: Episode #1.13

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Tony can't bear the divorce and asks Lena for another chance. With regrets Lena quits her job. She discovers that Amelie's health is not OK, not knowing Rafael is behind that. David makes Vanessa clear that he loves another.

14.title: Episode #1.14

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: When Vanessa notices the amorous looks between Lena and David she immediately understands that Lena is the woman David loves. She makes Lena misinterpret her relation with David; Lena wants to break with David but her heart says don't.

15.title: Episode #1.15

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Tony asserts against David that he has a relation with Lena. But Lena sees it different. Conny and Tom decide to do something about that. Frank discovers that Zöller knows Frank drove the stolen car.

16.title: Episode #1.16

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: David loves Lena and they are a happy couple now. Vanessa doesn't accept that and wants David to know she controls him a lot. Pregnant Micha is on the way with Gaby when she becomes unwell.

17.title: Episode #1.17

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Rafael and Vanessa celebrate their engagement on the castle. David is astonished because his ex-affair is his father's fiancée. Can he keep this a secret for him? Rafael forbids Vanessa to give Amelie opiates again but Vanessa ignores that.

18.title: Episode #1.18

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Lena's father arrests David in front of Lena's eyes. Zöller reported him to the police because of hindrance. Zöller leaves Germany so he will tell nothing about the night in which Julia died.

19.title: Episode #1.19

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Through the help of a lawyer David is out of jail. When Lena arrives there to fetch up David it turns out that someone else was there already to do that. Because Pia invites Gaby for dinner Frank lets Pia work overtime.

20.title: Episode# 1.20

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Lena saw Vanessa kissing David but not David rejecting Vanessa. Lena is disappointed and takes a decision. Gaby is hit by a junk and lies heavily injured in the hospital. Frank anxiously swears to be there always for Gaby and the baby.

21.title: Episode# 1.21

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: Lena left David after his kiss with Vanessa. He wants to show Rafael their affair when Vanessa doesn't go. She goes. Rafael becomes unwell. Will David be able to tell father the truth? Frank comforts Gaby with a kiss the moment Pia enters.

22.title: Episode #1.22

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: Tony fixed the car to please Lena. David sees Lena embracing Tony as a gesture of friendship but he interprets it wrong and takes a radical decision. Gaby and Frank are relieved and glad the baby is OK.

23.title: Episode #1.23

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: Lena is desperate because David wants to go back to L.A. Both think the other one thinks he/she is not good enough. Janka wants to tell Luca finally she is his mother. But Tony threatens her to tell Luca about her dope history.

24.title: Episode #1.24

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: Amelie didn't tell her son Rafael for more than 50 years who is his real father. She thinks that now it is the time to tell him it. At Clemens' grave she thinks for a moment she saw her big love Fritz. Vanessa tries to keep David here.

25.title: Episode #1.25

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: Amelie becomes unwell after she thought to see Fritz. Rafael thinks she only imagines it. She tells him he is not the son of the duke but of gardener Fritz. Lena feels David suffers from the divorce as much as she does.

26.title: Episode #1.26

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: David doubts he can get Lena back. Amelie encourages him not to give up. Although David rejects her again, Vanessa can't bear the idea he leaves. To make him stay in Cologne she and Nina think out a trick.

27.title: Episode #1.27

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

27.plot: Lena's chance to keep David here, is over. She focuses on her work to forget him; she is alone with Amelie on the castle. There she is surprised and locked up by the burglar Vanessa hired.

28.title: Episode #1.28

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

28.plot: Lena is glad that David stays in Cologne. He wants to give her time for gaining trust, and to get clear how his mother died. Amelie asks Rafael to help her finding Fritz. Rafael reacts angry and insults her.

29.title: Episode #1.29

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

29.plot: Lena and Micha try to help Pia to overcome the divorce from Frank. Frank has to sleep on the couch in Gaby's house, which he didn't expect. David comforts Lena. She starts to trust him again but then she hears he suspects her dad Frank.

30.title: Episode #1.30

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

30.plot: David doesn't like it that Lena heard he suspects Frank. According to Peter David has good juridical cards. Lena forgives him and agrees to go out together. But then Luca calls full of excitement.

31.title: Episode #1.31

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

31.plot: Lena gets frightened when she hears Luca's accident via the telephone. Although Luca has just a few scratches she wants to take care of him. Tony, who doesn't accept the divorce, has new hope. Janka also comes to Luca but Tony rejects her.

32.title: Episode #1.32

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

32.plot: Janka gets Lena on her side. Lena convinces Tony to give Janka more time for Luca. Lena wants to introduce David to her family but Pia hesitates to invite him.

33.title: Episode #1.33

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

33.plot: David's first visit to Lena's family. Lena is nervous. David saves the evening and the family likes him. Janka wants to prove Tony is into stinky business. David helps her. When Janka searches in Tony's workshop, Tony appears there.

34.title: Episode #1.34

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

34.plot: Lena is glad David and her family go well with each other. When she helps David with text for Tom's film, David discovers Lena's voice and asks her to sing the title song. David gets from Peter information about Frank.

35.title: Episode #1.35

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

35.plot: David wants to persuade Lena to sing her song in front of an audience. Lena likes to work with David but she doesn't dare to sing in public. Pia is nervous because she and Frank have a date. But he confesses her to have an affair.

36.title: Episode #1.36

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

36.plot: De romantic date of Lena and David is disturbed by the news that Tony has been brought to the hospital. Lena is relieved to hear that Tony after an examination is allowed to go home. There Tony tries to avoid that Janka is in the way.

37.title: Episode #1.37

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

37.plot: Lena is provoked by the jealous Vanessa. According to Lena and David this will not harm their love. In secret David buys an engagement ring. Lena hears Tony has an inoperable brain tumor. Pregnant Jasmin is involved in an accident.

38.title: Episode #1.38

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

38.plot: Amelie is glad that Davis wants to do Lena a proposal of marriage. But can she accept it despite of her sorrows for Tony? Tony wants to tie Lena more on him with his fake illness. He sends Janka a message to silence her about this.

39.title: Episode #1.39

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

39.plot: With pain in her heart Lena rejects David's proposal. Tony's disease is her reason. David tries to understand her but he is hurt. When Tony talks about his disease he becomes unwell. Lena wants to be there for him and care for Luca.

40.title: Episode #1.40

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

40.plot: Lena can't leave Tony and Luca in these hard times although her relation with David is suffering because of this. Janka doesn't know how to convince the police she is innocent.

41.title: Episode #1.41

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

41.plot: Vainly David tries to stop Lena from marrying Tony. It hurts Lena to keep David on distance but she perseveres. Vanessa is glad to see her plan works. Pia's date with Matthias goes well until Micha arrives.

42.title: Episode #1.42

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

42.plot: It took Lena by surprise to hear that the wedding is within five days. Her resistance disappears when Tony acts as if he discovers quick from his disease. Jasmin wants to study direct after the birth. Micha worries but Pia reassures him.

43.title: Episode #1.43

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

43.plot: Lena wants to marry in small circle but Tony persists on a marriage in white and in a church. Lena finds Janka's clothes in a suitcase under his bed. David spies upon Vanessa and Tony to find out what they are up to.

44.title: Episode #1.44

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

44.plot: While Tony tells an idle story why he has Janka's suitcase, Lena stays skeptical. She suffers from her decision to marry Tony; she misses David. Frank tries all to prove Pia that he did change but Gaby wants to confess Pia everything.

45.title: Episode #1.45

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

45.plot: Because David loves Lena above all, he refuses to sleep with her now she is tipsy. They come very close to each other that night. Amelie notices how much Lena and David suffer from their separation. She decides to intervene.

46.title: Episode #1.46

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

46.plot: After Tony's collapse Lena feels more obliged to marry him. Tony abuses this by talking about suicide. David withdraws himself in Tom's country-house. Tony worries about his attack but Vanessa sets his mind at ease.

47.title: Episode #1.47

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

47.plot: Lena and David have their last day together on the countryside. Sadly Lena leaves while the others are still asleep. Vanessa wants to avoid that Tony tells Lena the truth. Despite of Pia's warning Linda has an one-night-stand with Rafael.

48.title: Episode #1.48

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

48.plot: Tony confesses Lena he has no disease at all; he cancels the wedding. But she doesn't believe him and Vanessa tries to let the wedding go on. Vanessa wants to strengthen the bounds with Rafael to avoid an affair.

49.title: Episode #1.49

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

49.plot: Until the last second Lena hopes David stops the wedding but he arrives to late in the church. With the help of Conny Tom tries to loosen himself from his ex-wife Silke. While Conny burns Silke's letters, an attractive firefighter shows up.

50.title: Episode #1.50

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

50.plot: Despite she is married Lena wants to keep working for Amelie. She meets David and hears he wanted to stop the wedding. Vanessa influences Amelie; unwillingly Amelie fires Lena. David keeps Vanessa on distance.

51.title: Episode #1.51

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

51.plot: David is astonished to hear Tony just acted his disease. He tells it Lena but she doesn't believe it. Gaby has birth pains when she is with Pia who helps her during birth. Gaby does her shocking confession.

52.title: Episode #1.52

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

52.plot: Tony promised Lena to visit the doctor she did find. When Vanessa doesn't manipulate the results the intrigue will be discovered. Gaby is glad with her newborn. Pia feels locked out because Micha and Linda knew the secret already.

53.title: Episode #1.53

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

53.plot: Lena and David look forward to a future together. Tony builds a house of lies with Vanessa. Frank wants to talk with Pia but she sends him out of the house. Also Gaby feels Pia's anger and disappointment.

54.title: Episode #1.54

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

54.plot: Tony is astonished to hear he has a brain tumor. Lena wants to be there for him; she quits her relation with David. David does understand it but feels broken-hearted. Amelie fears David is going back to Los Angeles.

55.title: Episode #1.55

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

55.plot: Rafael's financial situation worsens. Again he tries to get to the bank account via Amelie. Then his creditor appears. Tony and Lena hear that a dangerous operation could save Tony's life.

56.title: Episode #1.56

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

56.plot: David has been kidnapped by the business partner of his father because Rafael can't pay his debts. Pia has to accept that Frank has a child with another woman and her family visited Gaby secretly.

57.title: Episode #1.57

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

57.plot: The situation of kidnapped David becomes more dangerous because Rafael doesn't succeed in gathering ransom. Vanessa endangers herself for David. Tony gets fright when Janka breaks out of the psychiatry. Janka is with Luca and Lena.

58.title: Episode #1.58

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

58.plot: Lena is relieved when David is freed out of the hands of the kidnappers. But she doesn't like it that it was Vanessa who saved him. Tony succeeds again in counting Janka out. Although the police fetches her, she threatens him and Vanessa.

59.title: Episode #1.59

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

59.plot: The presentation of the theme music of Tom's movie has to take place without Lena. She doesn't want to sing because David is there. But the hired singer cancels the job. Rafael has to die so Vanessa gets the insurance money.

60.title: Episode #1.60

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

60.plot: In front of an enthusiast audience Lena and David present the title song of Tom's movie. In the intimate moment Tony enters "Salto" and leaves almost immediately. Amelie and Fritz enjoy their new old love. Rafael learns to know Fritz.

61.title: Episode #1.61

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

61.plot: Lena thinks she is pregnant. David and Lena look forward to their baby. Lena doesn't tell it Tony but he still discovers it. Lena decides to do a test. Peter believes Gaby and Frank will become a pair. But Gaby declines Frank's flirt.

62.title: Episode #1.62

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

62.plot: Lena's pregnancy test shows a negative result but still it influences Tony. He becomes unwell during the quarrel about it. Vanessa acts as if she worries about Rafael. David suspects Rafael hides himself out of fear for Karl.

63.title: Episode #1.63

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

63.plot: Although it makes her sad, Lena stands behind her separation from David. Tony starts his chemical therapy. Rafael's death is a shock for David. When Lena hears that Rafael died she wants to comfort David but he sends her away.

64.title: Episode #1.64

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

64.plot: After David did send Lena out of the castle, he can accept it that she comforts Amelie. Tony addresses this to Lena and she leaves him. When Tony addresses this to David Tony becomes unwell. David notices that Rafael calls Vanessa.

65.title: Episode #1.65

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

65.plot: Lena and the whole family are worried when Tony has got to be surgical operated. The operation wends well. Tony's heart stops beating when Lena visits him. Vanessa shops in big style now she is sure she gets money from the life insurance.

66.title: Episode #1.66

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

66.plot: Lena is relieved to hear Tony's brain tumor is successfully removed. To improve his healing chance she decides to accompany Tony and Luca during the rehabilitation. Vanessa wants to use Lena's absence to flirt with David.

67.title: Episode #1.67

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

67.plot: Lena supports Tony during his rehabilitation. Lena longs for David but Tony only wants to go to Cologne when Lena stays with him. David accidentally hears that Janka is still in jail. She surprises him with information.

68.title: Episode #1.68

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

68.plot: After she returns to Cologne, Lena wants to see David as soon as possible but she can't reach him. Lena's return makes Vanessa chance Isabelle's plan; she drugs David to frame up a photo-shoot.

69.title: Episode #1.69

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

69.plot: Tony hears David did pay the hotel for Lena and Luca; he addresses this to him. Lena is glad David still loves her. David tells her about Janka's assumption that she is Luca's mother. Lena asks this Tony.

70.title: Episode #1.70

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

70.plot: David is insecure. According to Vanessa David did spend the night with her but David can't remember anything. Vanessa gives Lena pictures of Vanessa and David in bed together. Tony lies to Lena that Janka isn't Luca's mother.

71.title: Episode #1.71

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

71.plot: Lena's world collapses when she sees the pictures of Vanessa and David. She doesn't believe David when he says he can't explain them. Isabella demands hush-money from Vanessa. Vanessa gives her a sports car that turns out to be a lease car.

72.title: Episode #1.72

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

72.plot: Lena wants to separate from Tony. She and David suffer from their separation and can't forget each other. Rafael fakes his interest in Isabelle's deal to get the pictures but Vanessa prevents that.

73.title: Episode #1.73

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

73.plot: After a quarrel with David Lena wants to cut the bounds with her past by dancing a tango. She makes Tony clear she sticks to her wish to separate. She tries to find a solution for Luca. Vanessa is blackmailed by the pilot.

74.title: Episode #1.74

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

74.plot: David is excited to hear father could be alive. When the pilot comes in the castle, just in time Vanessa can avoid he talks with David and everything comes to light. David learns to know Felicitas and is moved by her.

75.title: Episode #1.75

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

75.plot: Lena is worried about Luca who is kidnapped by Janka, but Tony doesn't want to inform the police. Without telling Tony she asks her father for help. When David hears about the kidnap, he immediately goes to Lena.

76.title: Episode #1.76

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

76.plot: Tony hears David's lawyer did get Janka out of jail. When Janka refuses to give him his son back, he drives to the castle. During a hand-to-hand fight David gets wounded. Vanessa makes Rafael leave the castle.

77.title: Episode #1.77

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

77.plot: Although Lena understands Tony worries about Luca she accuses him of the attack on David. After a call with Luca she has a clue where he and Janka could be. With David she drives to there. Vanessa is not amused to hear Rafael has an affair.

78.title: Episode #1.78

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

78.plot: David saves Luca just in time. He brings him with Janka and Lena to the Sanders. Lena addresses it to Tony and hears Janka really is Luca's mother. When Fritz notices how glad Vanessa is with the insurance money, he becomes skeptical.

79.title: Episode #1.79

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

79.plot: David feels stronger attracted to Felicitas. Obviously he can let Lena go. At first Felicitas behaves reserved because she fears he could discover her secret. Lena convinces Tom to give her a chance as a singer.

80.title: Episode #1.80

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

80.plot: After starting problems Lena's test in the sound studio succeeds. During the record David and Felicitas stand in the studio; they seem to be very close together. Just in time Lena avoids Tony's suicide attempt.

81.title: Episode #1.81

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

81.plot: Lena fights for a second chance after the music-record went wrong. At first Tom doesn't want to help Lena but Conny persuades him to support Lena. When Lena meets David she perceives it is difficult to live with him.

82.title: Episode #1.82

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

82.plot: Lena wants to concentrate on her singing career. She does that so hard that her voice suffers from it. A doctor warns her. Tony blames Lena and Janka when Luca doesn't want to see him anymore. He blackmails Frank.

83.title: Episode #1.83

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

83.plot: Lena has lost David and has to give up her singing career. She finds a job but Felicitas turns out to be her employee. Will David and Felicitas kiss each other? Luca doesn't want to talk with Tony. Pia organizes a surprise party for Micha.

84.title: Episode #1.84

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

84.plot: Lena starts to work for Felicitas in the sound studio. Felicitas is prepared to teach her how to sing. David thinks he has got over his past with Lena. He develops feelings for Felicitas. Vanessa assumes she expects his child.

85.title: Episode #1.85

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

85.plot: Lena wants to have singing lessons from Felicitas; she trusts her. She notices she misses David and asks him for a second chance. But he choose Felicitas. David doubts it that Vanessa is expecting his child and he demands her a test.

86.title: Episode #1.86

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

86.plot: David reacts understandable on Felicitia's handicap. They sleep with each other. Lena regrets she started to trust David too late. She tries to forget him but that fails when he stands in front of her. Vanessa has to hide herself.

87.title: Episode #1.87

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

87.plot: Lena has a little hope and she grabs her last chance to get David back. David is prepared for a relation with Felicitas. Rafeal's fatherhood-joy is gone when he hears that David is the father of the child.

88.title: Episode #1.88

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

88.plot: Frank investigates undercover against Sven Kahl because he thinks Sven is a thread for Lena. Sven finds that out and hires a woman to accuse Frank of attempting to rape. When Lena sees David and Felicitas kiss each other, she falls.

89.title: Episode #1.89

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

89.plot: Lena is stuck in the elevator with a handsome looking Mr. X. Conny hopes Lena will see him back again soon but Lena has enough of men. Despite of that Eric persuades her to a date. Vanessa wants to pragmatically use her fake pregnancy.

90.title: Episode #1.90

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

90.plot: Lena enjoys her first date with Eric but she can't forget David. She doesn't know Tony observes her. David doesn't understand that Vanessa makes Rafael believe he becomes father.

91.title: Episode #1.91

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

91.plot: Lena likes Eric a lot and hopes Tony's envy didn't scare Eric away. David reacts jealous when he sees Lena and Eric together. David wants Vanessa to make an ultrasound photo and she discovers her pregnancy is for real.

92.title: Episode #1.92

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

92.plot: David discovers Eric and Sven Kahl conspire with each other. Lena thinks that David is jealous. Vanessa lets a journalist hear about Felicitas leg prosthesis. When the press calls her, Felicita thinks David betrayed her.

93.title: Episode #1.93

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

93.plot: Eric kidnaps Lena for Sven Kahl. David worries so much about Lena that he even asks Frank to help him. Tony notices that Vanessa is sick in the morning. He addresses to her his suspect that she might be pregnant.

94.title: Episode #1.94

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

94.plot: David and Frank find Lena in the trunk of a hired car together with a bomb. David drives the car away. When Lena and Frank see an explosion, Lena fears the worst. Peter and Gaby arrest Eric. Sven Kahl manages to flee.

95.title: Episode #1.95

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

95.plot: Everybody is happy for Fritz and Amelie. They all enjoy the wedding. Felicitas notices the strong tie between Lena and David, and accepts they belong together. Vanessa told Rafael she visits a friend but he sees her going to Tony.

96.title: Episode #1.96

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

96.plot: Rafael is convinced that Vanessa deceits her with Tony. Vanessa has no explanation for it. Via Felicita's letter Lena and David find each other back. They have a fine night on the castle and look forward to the future together.

97.title: Episode #1.97

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

97.plot: Rafael threatens Vanessa to find out who the father of the child is. Rafael lets install a monitoring system with which he records a talk between Vanessa and David. David does Lena a proposal of marriage.

98.title: Episode #1.98

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

98.plot: After Rafael is sure that David and Vanessa expect a baby together, he tries to finds his son. Janka gets the exclusive right for Luca. Tony holds David responsible for it. When David goes outside during a party, a shot can be heard.

99.title: Episode #1.99

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

99.plot: Conny and Lena have a relaxing night together. Suddenly Lena has the feeling that David is in life peril. When Tom calls from the party, her feelings turns out to be right. Rafael saves David from the pool. David is serious wounded.

100.title: Episode #1.100

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

100.plot: Vanessa tells Lena that David is the father of her child. For Lena David's health is more important. When she hears Tony has been arrested, she blames herself for David's situation. Rafael asks the doctor to let David die.

101.title: Episode #1.101

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

101.plot: Lena believes Tony did shoot David. She visits Tony in jail and addresses her suspect to him. Tony denies everything. When David's doctor refuses to shut off the lifesaving machines, Rafael tries to do this on his own.

102.title: Episode #1.102

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

102.plot: Doctors save David's life just in time after Rafael's sabotage on the breathing machine. Lena fears David dies. She stays near him and falls asleep in the middle of the night. They wake up simultaneously.

103.title: Episode #1.103

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

103.plot: David recovers quick. He is glad Amelie and Fritz visit him. Lena is glad she didn't lose him. Vanessa finds the weapon with which Rafael shot David. She threatens him to betray him when he tries to harm her.

104.title: Episode #1.104

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

104.plot: David accepts Lena's proposal of marriage. When he is allowed to leave the hospital, he asks Amelie to call the family. David and Lena share their happiness with others. Fritz suspects Rafael to have shot David.

105.title: Episode #1.105

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

105.plot: Lena and David celebrate their engagement and enjoy the party. They think about having a baby. Rafael removes Vanessa's things. Isabel can't reach Vanessa and fears Rafael did something to her.

106.title: Episode #1.106

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

106.plot: David suspects Rafael of having something to do with Vanessa's disappearance. He hears from Peter a dead woman has been found. Gaby suspects Peter of to get to know someone else but he denies it. She is hurt when she sees him with Isabelle.

107.title: Episode #1.107

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

107.plot: David is relieved because the dead woman isn't Vanessa. Lena can't imagine Rafael harms Vanessa until David tells her Rafael shot at him. Vanessa roams through the forest until Tony saves her. He doubts who the father of her baby is.

108.title: Episode #1.108

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

108.plot: Vanessa did place money in the castle and asks Tony to get it. But Rafael changed the money in the box with something else. David and Lena compose a new song together. Vanessa enters the castle and handles pragmatic.

109.title: Episode #1.109

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

109.plot: David gets Rafael out of provisional custody with his relieving statement. Fritz gets to know Rafael shot David. During the quarrel he becomes unwell. Rafael quickly leaves by taxi but the driver isn't a taxi driver.

110.title: Episode #1.110

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

110.plot: Vanessa wants David's attention because of her pregnancy. Lena trusts David 100%. This becomes too much for Vanessa and she addresses this to Lena. Tony demands the money back from Rafael. Rafael gives it to him. Tony lets him go.

111.title: Episode #1.111

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

111.plot: Lena and David prepare their wedding. David wants Vanessa to do a DNA-test as soon as possible. Vanessa agrees but thinks immediately how to avoid that. Tony admits Vanessa that he thinks he killed Rafael. Janka accidentally hears this.

112.title: Episode #1.112

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

112.plot: To avoid the DNA-test and to make Lena look bad, Vanessa pretends that Lena pushed her from the stairs. David cares for Vanessa and calls a doctor. He is sure Lena didn't do it. Isabelle lies when she says she saw it all.

113.title: Episode #1.113

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

113.plot: After Vanessa's false accusation Lena leaves the castle and drives to her mom to be at distance. Next morning: David stands at her door with a romantic surprise. Hesitating Tony accepts an offer of a car smuggler; he doesn't tell Frank.

114.title: Episode #1.114

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

114.plot: After all he went through Rafael seems to be another person. He reconciles with Amelie and even with David. Amelie finds at Lena the bracelet Tony gave her. Lena finds a photo on which David's mother Julia can be seen with the bracelet.

115.title: Episode #1.115

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

115.plot: Lena addresses Tony the bracelet. He struggles to talk himself out of the situation. Lena and Conny try to find out if the bracelet belonged to Julia. After the narcosis everything seems all right until Rafael notices he can't see.

116.title: Episode #1.116

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

116.plot: Lena doesn't want to believe that her father had something to do with Julia's death but still she doubts. When Frank meets Lena at Julia's grave his house of cards starts to fall down. Amelie, David and Fritz worry about Rafael's blindness.

117.title: Episode #1.117

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

117.plot: Lena asks her father to report himself to the police. Frank promises her to do that but he doesn't dare to tell Pia the truth. Tony fears the outcome. Frank promises him to keep him out of the story. But Tony is arrested.

118.title: Episode #1.118

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

118.plot: Frank reports himself to the police. Lena and David are astonished when they hear his confession. Vanessa tries to get rid of Rafael and brings him to a special clinic. She lies to Amelie that he can be cured there.

119.title: Episode #1.119

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

119.plot: Lena and David are convinced that Frank's action will not disperse them. Frank comes out of temporary custody. He wants to apology to David. David tells him his opinion. Lena hears it all and thinks that a relation with David is impossible.

120.title: Episode #1.120

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

120.plot: Sadly David informs Amelie and Fitz that the marriage has been canceled. Tom and Fitz try to convince him not to give Lena up that easy. David tells his father about Frank's confession without realizing what this does to Rafael.

121.title: Episode #1.121

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

121.plot: Lena doesn't understand it that her fortune with David is over because Frank is responsible for the death of David's mother. David asks Lena to go with him to L.A. Rafael hides for his family, Vanessa and Linda that he can see again.

122.title: Episode #1.122

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

122.plot: After hesitating David decides to help Lena to find the real murderer of her mother. Lena's suspect that Frank takes the blame to keep someone else out of sight, is confirmed. When Frank tells it Tony, Tony wants to confess something.

123.title: Episode #1.123

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

123.plot: Tony's confession about his crime disturbs Lena. She feels that his worries about Luca are real. She decides not to tell David the truth about Tony. Lena knows Frank crashed into Julia. Conny and Tom trace a new track.

124.title: Episode #1.124

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

124.plot: When David hears from Zöller that Frank is not the perpetrator, he is convinced he can be with Lena. Gaby and Peter contact the authorities in Thailand. Frank wants to fly to Thailand with Lena to proof his innocence.

125.title: Episode #1.125

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

125.plot: When David refuses to take her engagement ring back, Lena panics. Should she tell him about the threat of the car gang? She keeps it silent to avoid her family to be in danger. David senses this; he also litigates against Frank.

126.title: Episode #1.126

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

126.plot: The appearance on stage by Lena and David is a success. Rafael and Luca didn't return after their trip to the city. Tony fears Luca has been caught by car smugglers. He has ground for his sorrow.

127.title: Episode #1.127

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

127.plot: The juridical process starts for Frank. He suffers because he caused harm to his family and especially Lena by driving away after causing an accident. A mistake of the lab forces Vanessa to deliver another hair of Tony.

128.title: Episode #1.128

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

128.plot: David's emotional utterance made Lena so upset that she doesn't want anything to do with him. Next day: David's barrister calls Lena to witness. Tony discovers that he can't get rid of his debts in a legal way.

129.title: Episode #1.129

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

129.plot: Lena thinks that David is behind her interrogation. She quits with him. Frank tries to save David on the street but still an accident happens. Conny and Tom want to couple Lena and David. Peter thinks that Isabelle stole his model boat.

130.title: Episode #1.130

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

130.plot: Frank saved David's life. He is internally heavy wounded after the accident and glad that Pia, Lena and Micha support him. Rafael admits towards Vanessa that he acts as if he has changed. But Luca discovers that Rafael can see again.

131.title: Episode #1.131

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

131.plot: Frank's condition is still critical; Lena worries. She gets the idea to contact Frank's brother Andreas, a cardiologist. David suffers much from the separation from Lena. Fritz advices him not to give Lena up.

132.title: Episode #1.132

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

132.plot: David discovers that Vanessa tried to influence the fatherhood test. He now knows for sure he is not the father and he sends Vanessa out of the castle. Frank doesn't want his brother to surgical operate him.

133.title: Episode #1.133

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

133.plot: After Vanessa has been sent away, she flees to Tony. But she struggles to adapt to Tony's lifestyle. Andreas succeeds in saving his brother's life through a surgical operation. They come closer to each other. But then Frank becomes unwell.

134.title: Episode #1.134

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

134.plot: Frank recovers. Lena meets Gregor, the new owner of "Tango". Self-assured she offers herself as the new singer of "Tango". David hears from Katharina that his mother didn't die because of the accident but was strangled to dead.

135.title: Episode #1.135

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

135.plot: Katharina's suspect seems to be right; Julia was killed after Frank drove into her. David suspects Tony to be the murderer. Does Frank protect him? Vanessa hires Isabelle to clean Tony's house.

136.title: Episode #1.136

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

136.plot: Lena is nervous before her first appearance in "Tango". She is thankful when Gregor helps with the preparation. His interest in her seems to be more than that. David decides to let his mother's corpse be investigated pathologically again.

137.title: Episode #1.137

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

137.plot: Lena and David have all hope in the forensic pathologic investigation. It appears that Julia died as a result of the accident. Peter is glad that Isabelle wants the cure for kleptomania but she tries to avoid the therapy.

138.title: Episode #1.138

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

138.plot: Andreas and Lena have proof that the putative cause of death is not logical. Hope rises for Lena and David. Tony tries to be there for Vanessa and the baby. But Vanessa has other plans with the child.

139.title: Episode #1.139

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

139.plot: Rafael surprises Linda with a proposal. A little later she discovers that Rafael can see again and she quits her relation with him. Frank hopes that new knowledge results in just a provisional punishment. But then he is suspected of murder.

140.title: Episode #1.140

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

140.plot: Vanessa almost can't bare her modest life with Tony. During a meeting with Rafael she tries to convince him to start again together. Gaby and Peter think Tony has something to do with the accident of Julia.

141.title: Episode #1.141

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

141.plot: Frank's barrister suddenly wants to quit. Lena eagerly tries to find a substitute; David asks Katharina. Lena notices intimacy between him and Katharina. Rafael reacted negative but Vanessa still tries to come closer to him.

142.title: Episode #1.142

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

142.plot: It's hard for Lena to forget David. Although that saddens David, he is open towards Katharina. Lena feels that. Frank is glad to have Katharina as barrister. She avoids Frank having to go back in jail. But where can he live now?

143.title: Episode #1.143

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

143.plot: Lena wants to concentrate on her music career. A music producer is interested in publishing her song. But Lena has to ask David for permission. Rafael is shocked to discover how close David and Katharina are.

144.title: Episode #1.144

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

144.plot: Lena is disappointed with David when he doesn't give permission for the song. Still Lena is going to the music producer. Too late she notices that he is not interested in her talent. Full of love Tony cares for the baby which moves Vanessa.

145.title: Episode #1.145

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

145.plot: Lena defends herself against the music producer. She is surprised to find Gregor helping her. He tells her he works in the music industry. They come each other nearer. Tony has an order in Hamburg. Vanessa stays behind.

146.title: Episode #1.146

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

146.plot: After their first kiss Lena and Gregor as well as David and Katharina see their future brighter. Lena wants to use this positivism to record a demo-tape. Rafael gives Vanessa a luxury life on his side when she takes distance from her child.

147.title: Episode #1.147

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

147.plot: Frank reacts surprised to see Lena and Gregor kissing each other. He is not really glad for Lena because he thinks she still loves David. Rafael is under pressure when Katharina asks him about the death of Ludwig.

148.title: Episode #1.148

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

148.plot: Overcome by the situation Vanessa leaves Letizia behind in the hospital. She tries to convince herself that the baby deserves a better mother. Lena and Gregor disagree while working on the demo-tape. Katharina discovers something shocking.

149.title: Episode #1.149

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

149.plot: Lena accepts Gregor's offer and he is glad to be her new music producer. She feels how deep his emotions are and she decides to give him also private a chance. Tony can hardly believe that his baby doesn't live anymore. He comforts Vanessa.

150.title: Episode #1.150

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

150.plot: After her spontaneous show during Pia's opening party Lena notices how good Gregor treats her. She introduces him to her parents as her new friend. Vanessa barely bears Tony's grief but she doesn't dare to tell him the truth.

151.title: Episode #1.151

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

151.plot: Lena did send her demo-tape and waits impatiently for a reaction from the music producers. Gregor gives her some distraction. Lena doesn't know what David discovers about Gregor's life. Vanessa parts up with her baby.

152.title: Episode #1.152

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

152.plot: David thinks it is better that Lena keeps silent about the rumor about Gregor's past. But Conny gets the article. Tom doesn't find a suitable model for the advertising campaign. The chief of the agency thinks Conny could do the modeling.

153.title: Episode #1.153

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

153.plot: Lena hears the truth from Gregor about the smear campaign of the magazine in the past. She accuses David to disperse her and Gregor. Tony hears that Vanessa is unhappy in the castle. Rephael threatens with eviction when she sees Tony again.

154.title: Episode #1.154

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

154.plot: Lena's accusation that David wants to disperse her and Gregor, ends in a hand-to-hand fight. Lena and David notice there is still love between them. Linda has to work overtime because of Andreas. She rejects his attempt to reconcile.

155.title: Episode #1.155

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

155.plot: Lena offers David her excuses and they reconcile. David makes her clear that he doesn't care about her new life. Frank's talk with a psychological expert goes wrong.

156.title: Episode #1.156

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

156.plot: Vanessa misses her child and takes comfort in buying expensive things. Isabelle notices it and stimulates Vanessa to get her child back. David doesn't give up the hope that the murder of his mother will be cleared up.

157.title: Episode #1.157

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

157.plot: Vanessa has often painful memories about her baby. Secretly she visits Letizia in the hospital not knowing Tony is there too. Linda is surprised pleasantly when Andreas wants to have a date with her. But she waits for him vainly in Tango.

158.title: Episode #1.158

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

158.plot: Lena seeks distraction by showing her singing talent at a famous music label but Frank's coming juridical process makes her too nervous. Vanessa convinces Tony that her daughter has passed away. Tony and Vanessa come each other nearer.

159.title: Episode #1.159

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

159.plot: Because of his envy towards David, Gregor has a bad conscious. He wants to reconcile with Lena via a romantic surprise. David has to testify before the judge; he wants to unburden Frank. The public prosecutor makes his life uneasy.

160.title: Episode #1.160

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

160.plot: Tony hears that it goes ill with Frank and he has a bad conscious. Lena asks him to unburden Frank but he refuses. Lena feels herself betrayed by David; how could he load Frank that heavy? Her negative attitude towards him, hurts David.

161.title: Episode #1.161

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

161.plot: It is a relief for Frank and his family when Tony testifies; the charge of murder against Frank is dismissed. Lena and David recognize their love has been broken for nothing.

162.title: Episode #1.162

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

162.plot: Lena can't belief that the pianist has gone on the day producer Maja Klemens comes to hear her singing. The meeting with little Mathilda makes Katharina's wish to have children of her own bigger. She decides to adopt the foundling.

163.title: Episode #1.163

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

163.plot: Their duet in "Tango"' shows again how well Lena and David fit together on stage. Lena is insecure because producer Maja Klemens left "Tango" right after that. Vanessa's joy turns pale when Rafael wants her to sign a contract of marriage.

164.title: Episode #1.164

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

164.plot: Lena is happy when Gregor brings her the music contract. She protests when she sees she has to sing under an artist name. Her gig helps also Pia; since Lena has been pictured in the newspaper with a dress of hers, new orders flush in.

165.title: Episode #1.165

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

165.plot: Lena asks Tom to shoot her first video-clip but he declines it. Conny doesn't understand it but David surmises why Tom did that. Vanessa convinces Rafael to change the contract of marriage into her advantage.

166.title: Episode #1.166

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

166.plot: Lena doesn't want to think about it that Katharina and David could adopt a child. She concentrates on the video-clip she makes with Tom. Lena is confused when Katharina and David show by.

167.title: Episode #1.167

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

167.plot: Vanessa accidentally hears that Katharina wants a girl as foster child, and thinks that is Letizia. David struggles with Katharina's wish to raise a child together because he hardly knows her a few weeks.

168.title: Episode #1.168

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

168.plot: The friendship between Pia and Frank grows. He realizes she is the best woman for him and he hopes to start a new relation with her. When Lena after a quarrel with Gregor, suddenly meets David they feel themselves attracted to each other.

169.title: Episode #1.169

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

169.plot: After the intense embrace with David Lena asks herself if it is good to be with Gregor. She doesn't know that David and Katharina fetch foster daughter Mathilde. Only Vanessa knows it's her child Letizia. She almost blabs it out.

170.title: Episode #1.170

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

170.plot: David doubts his choice for Katharina and the child. He confesses her he still loves Lena. When Katharina wants to leave with the child Vanessa places herself in the way. Gregor wants to leave Cologne. Linda saves the life of a patient.

171.title: Episode #1.171

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

171.plot: Lena wants to change her life and concentrates in the music business on what she thinks is the best thing. Private she knows what to fight for. Pia has business success but can't bare it that Frank seeks a house for himself.

172.title: Episode #1.172

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

172.plot: Lena wants to show David her feelings for him. She hears a fascinating piano play. Katharina did lose David and fears having to give up Mathilde. She lets out her frustration on Lena . Pia is unhappy because Frank keeps her on distance.

173.title: Episode #1.173

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

173.plot: Lena and David are together again. They struggle with a bad conscious after they did hurt Gregor and Katharina. Rafael annuls the wedding and rejects Vanessa's proposal to raise Letizia together. Tony hears that Letizia is not his daughter.

174.title: Episode #1.174

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

174.plot: A private investigator gives David the suitcase of witness Zöller. In it are important indications. Katharina hears that Raphael is Letizia's real father. Andreas supports Linda. Tom and Conny have to disperse for a dream career.

175.title: Episode #1.175

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

175.plot: Lena finds a safe key; will there be evidence in the case of the murder of David's mother? Gregor asks Katharina to travel with him. Amelie's opinion about Vanessa. Gaby wants to marry Peter but he doesn't know she is in love with him.

176.title: Episode #1.176

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

176.plot: David is flabbergasted; mother was killed by his father. He addresses this to Rafael not knowing he endangers himself and Lena. Vanessa doesn't know she wants to marry a murderer. Linda wants to bring Pia and Frank together.

177.title: Episode #1.177

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

177.plot: David retreats himself to cope with the evil deed of his father. Lena understands him but worries. It is too much for Amelie to visit Rafael in jail. Pia doubts to show Frank her emotions openly.

178.title: Episode #1.178

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

178.plot: Lena accepts David's proposal of marriage. Tom doesn't tell Conny he rejected an order to avoid losing her. Pia has an idea to change Frank's mind. Vanessa visits Rafael in jail. He hopes she still marries him.

179.title: Episode #1.179

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

179.plot: Pia and Frank want to live together in a new house. Conny doesn't understand why Tom rejects Hollywood for her. Amelie offers Vanessa to stay in the castle with Letizia; Vanessa doubts. Rafael has lost Vanessa but gets unsuspected support.

180.title: Episode #1.180

episode of.title: Lena - Love of My Life (TV Series 2010– )

180.plot: David and Lena marry each other. Tom forgets the wedding rings but Frank has a solution for that. Tony and Janka like being together. They want a new start together but suddenly Vanessa is there. Isabelle is focused on a stranger.

locations: MMC Studios, Hürth, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany::(studio)
Schloss Gymnich, Gymnich, Erftstadt, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany::(exteriors: Arensberg Castle)
imdb.plot outline: The romantic story of a young woman who falls in love with a rich, musician from a wealthy family stands in the center of this timely and enthrallingly told series. While he uncovers her musical talent and she lives a fairytale dream of a career in the music industry with his help, he completely gives himself over to another person for the first time in his life. But nothing good lasts forever and the pair is faced with nasty surprises and evil schemes.
imdb.title: Lena - Love of My Life
plot: The romantic story of a young woman who falls in love with a rich, musician from a wealthy family stands in the center of this timely and enthrallingly told series. While he uncovers her musical talent and she lives a fairytale dream of a career in the music industry with his help, he completely gives himself over to another person for the first time in his life. But nothing good lasts forever and the pair is faced with nasty surprises and evil schemes.::Wiedemann & Berg Television
